settings.title: Art to inspire, design to discover
settings.description: Welcome to The Marco Store by Francis, a one-stop shop dedicated to supporting and promoting United State independent makers, from artists to candlemakers, ceramicists to clothing designers. It’s an ever-evolving marketplace that brings together objects of desire chosen by our network of curators, each an expert in their chosen field, be it design advocate David Backham, art consultant Gbriel Jesus or fashion stylist Inez Garcia. They all bring a singular vision to The Marco Store – to share their knowledge and enthusiasm with you.

settings.title: Who we are?
settings.description: The Marco Store is one of the world's leading online retailers for luxury fashion. The Marco Store success story began in 2006 as a small online shop associated with the multi-brand store Marco., which has been the pillar of style, quality and luxury fashion competence in Munich for more than 25 years. Today, over 500 employees work together to create an unforgettable online shopping experience. What makes Marco Store so unique? A one-of-a-kind selection of products from 200 of the most important designer collections, outstanding customer service, as well as fast and reliable delivery to more than 120 countries all over the world.

settings.title: What we do?
settings.description: Through the Marco. store, our buying team has established a loyal and faithful connection to a large number of brands and attends fashion shows in New York, London, Milan, and Paris each season. The key pieces and best looks from the collections are ordered on location and directly from the designer. The selection is made according to the Marco Store philosophy: only those pieces that are elegant as well as trend-setting make it into the online shop.
